sect1.title: Organization
sect1.para: This book is divided into the following parts.

sect2.title: Part I &emdash; Introduction
sect2.para: This part contains information which is essential to the rest of the book.

sect2.title: Part II &emdash; &book-product; Code Hackers
sect2.para: This part contains information just for &book-product;'s code hackers.

sect2.title: Part III &emdash; Document Editors
sect2.para: This part contains information just for &book-product;'s documentation editors.
